title: Tesla, Toyota Accuse Biden’s EV Tax Credit of Putting Unions Over the Environment
sub_head: Consumers get full credit only if they buy union-built cars; White House says it wants to save middle-class jobs and the planet
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden says he wants to save the planet and save union jobs. The electric-vehicle tax credit in his social spending package shows how those aims can sometimes conflict.
The proposal being negotiated by House and Senate Democrats gives consumers the full $12,500 tax write-off only if they buy electric vehicles assembled by union workers using American-built batteries. Automobiles produced in nonunion factories would qualify for $4,500 less.
